member.name: T:Unity.Extensions.Serilog.LoggerConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Extends with methods to add Unity enricher, sink, and other configuration.

member.name: M:Unity.Extensions.Serilog.LoggerConfigurationExtensions.AddUnity(Serilog.LoggerConfiguration,Serilog.Formatting.ITextFormatter,UnityEngine.ILogger,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,Serilog.Enrichers.Unity.UnityLogEnricherSettings,Serilog.Sinks.Unity.UnitySinkSettings)
member.summary: Add the Unity Console to the Serilog pipeline.
member.param: Whether Serilog's is set to Unity's . Useful during development, but may generate noisy warnings if trying to destructure s in s.
Whether to set based on Unity's .
Whether to use the to enrich s with Unity-specific properties.
Whether to use the to write s out to the Unity Debug Console (and associated log files).
By default, is set to to reuse the type name set by Serilog as the Unity log tag.

member.name: T:Unity.Extensions.Serilog.UnityLogContextDestructuringPolicy
member.summary:
Policy for destructuring instances with a single item, representing the context for a Unity log.
Provides a mechanism for preserving instances added to a 's properties (e.g., via ) so that the instance may be used as the context of a Unity message (without affecting the destructuring of other log property values set by API consumers).
